Colonial Road, at the N.E. corner of 71st Street, showing the hone of Joseph A. Perry from 1851-1873. It was also known as the William A. Perry Maansion. (This house Was moved in March 1923 to a new site on Mackey
Place, horth side, between Shore Road and Narrows Ave.)7
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
